name: Demos for Projectile Motion Pro
description:
Welcome to Demos for Projectile Motion Pro.

Projectile Motion Pro is a physics asset for Unity which provides a collection of algorithms that focuses on physically-based launch force calculation, so that when your object needs to perform a projectile motion to a specific point, you can launch it with real force (Rigidbody.AddForce) instead of mimic by moving it along a curve.

Projectile Motion Pro is coming to itch.io soon!

Follow me and I'll let you know when it's released.

The documentation is already available in the Download section, so you can get a sneak peak.
